text: Entre-Vignes is a commune in the Hérault department in the Occitanie region in southern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Saint-Christol (the seat) and Vérargues.Arrêté préfectoral 13 December 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Hérault department ==References== Category:Communes of Hérault
title: Entre-Vignes
